text: I do think the patriotic thing to do is to critique my country. How else do you make a country better but by pointing out its flaws?
author: Bill Maher

text: It is the patriotic duty of every man to lie for his country.
author: Alfred Adler

text: The tree of liberty needs to be watered from time to time with the blood of patriots and tyrants.
author: Lyn Nofziger

text: Patriotism is an instant reaction that fades away when the war starts.
author: Mick Jagger

text: The patriot blood of my father was warm in my veins.
author: Clara Barton
